definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: During Hellenistic times, Greek women also started to artificially wave and curl their hair.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊化时代期间，希腊女人就已开始人为地卷发了。

sentences.english: Burritos and tacos similarly have their origins in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 玉米饼以及玉米面豆卷发源于墨西哥。

sentences.english: Did you know 65 percent of women have curly hair?[1]
sentences.chinese: 你知道有65%的女士都留着卷发吗？

sentences.english: A thief had a son who had lovely curls.
sentences.chinese: 一个小偷有个长着可爱卷发的儿子。

sentences.english: Dozens of bees circled his tousled brown curls in an angle's halo.
sentences.chinese: 一群蜜蜂绕着他那蓬乱的棕色卷发，好像天使的光环。

sentences.english: Her dark, human like hair, hung in loose curls around her almost angelic face.
sentences.chinese: 她乌黑的如同真人般的卷发垂在天使般的面庞边。

sentences.english: I don't like my hair straight so I'm having it curled.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢直头发，所以要去烫个卷发。

sentences.english: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mika, I now have beautiful curly hair. I feel good about myself again.
sentences.chinese: 感谢米卡，我现在有美丽的卷发，让我又找到了自信。

sentences.english: Do you remember the pop singer with funny glasses and long curcy hair?
sentences.chinese: 你记得那个留着长卷发，戴着有趣眼镜的流行歌手吗？

sentences.english: The Twisted Headbands favor people who want hair out of their face and it also works on curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 麻花头带适合希望头发不要遮住脸的人，也适合卷发。

sentences.english: To twist(the hair, for example) into ringlets or coils.
Look at my curls, and you want me to get married?! ?!
sentences.chinese: 看看我满头卷发，我能结婚吗？

sentences.english: Yunyun curls her hair for Kepen said his former girlfriend had curled hair and very cute.
sentences.chinese: 因为修平告诉蕴蕴前女友是卷发，很可爱。

sentences.english: Maybe it's your curly hair or the dimple you get when you smile.
sentences.chinese: 比如你的卷发或微笑时的酒窝。

sentences.english: Curly hair runs in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 卷发在这家是世代相传的。

definition: cape/shawl/(of long hair) to trail over one's shoulders
level with one's shoulders/(of two people) both the same height
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
